subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: The German speedskater Jenny Wolf broke her world record in the women’s 100 meters with a time of 10.22 seconds at a World Cup race in Erfurt, Germany. That broke the mark of 10.28 she set in Calgary, Alberta, on March 4. Xing Aihua of China was second in 10.59, followed by Judith Hesse of Germany in 10.62.
